Author: sugafreedreams
Text: You can plan what you eat around the pills, for example eat only a light low fiber/fat breakfast that you don't have to purge when you take them, so it digests fast and leaves the stomach completely before you eat again. After the food that you took the pills with has left the stomach and moved on to the small intestine, eating more food and purging it won't weaken the medicine's effect.
